verses.verse: In the <S%H8141>year<s%> that <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H5818>Uzziah<s%> <S%H4194>died,<s%> I <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H853>the<s%> <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3427>sitting<s%> on a <S%H3678>throne,<s%> <S%H7311>high<s%> and lifted <S%H5375>up;<s%> and his <S%H7757>train<s%> <S%H4392>filled<s%> the <S%H1964>temple.<s%>

<S%H4605>Above<s%> him <S%H5975>stood<s%> the <S%H8314>seraphim.<s%> <S%H259>Each<s%> one had <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3671>wings.<s%> With <S%H8147>two<s%> he <S%H3680>covered<s%> his <S%H6440>face.<s%> With <S%H8147>two<s%> he <S%H3680>covered<s%> his <S%H7272>feet.<s%> With <S%H8147>two<s%> he <S%H5774>flew.<s%>

One <S%H7121>called<s%> to <S%H559>another,<s%> and said, <S%H6918>"Holy,<s%> <S%H6918>holy,<s%> <S%H6918>holy,<s%> is <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies!<s%> The whole <S%H776>earth<s%> is <S%H4393>full<s%> of his <S%H3519>glory!<s%>"

The <S%H520>foundations<s%> of the <S%H5592>thresholds<s%> <S%H5128>shook<s%> at the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of him who <S%H7121>called,<s%> and the <S%H1004>house<s%> was <S%H4390>filled<s%> with <S%H6227>smoke.<s%>

Then I <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H188>"Woe<s%> is <S%H1820>me!<s%> For I am undone, because I am a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H2931>unclean<s%> <S%H8193>lips,<s%> and I <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of a <S%H5971>people<s%> of <S%H2931>unclean<s%> <S%H8193>lips:<s%> for my <S%H5869>eyes<s%> have <S%H7200>seen<s%> the <S%H4428>King,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies!<s%>"

Then <S%H259>one<s%> of the <S%H8314>seraphim<s%> <S%H5774>flew<s%> to <S%H7531>me,<s%> having a live coal in his <S%H3027>hand,<s%> which he had <S%H3947>taken<s%> with the <S%H4457>tongs<s%> from off the <S%H4196>altar.<s%>

He <S%H5060>touched<s%> my <S%H6310>mouth<s%> with <S%H559>it,<s%> and said, <S%H5060>"Behold,<s%> this has touched your <S%H8193>lips;<s%> and your <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> is taken <S%H5493>away,<s%> and your <S%H2403>sin<s%> <S%H3722>forgiven.<s%>"

I <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%>'s <S%H6963>voice,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "Whom shall I <S%H7971>send,<s%> and who will <S%H3212>go<s%> for <S%H559>us?<s%>" Then I said, "Here I <S%H7971>am.<s%> Send me!"

He <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3212>"Go,<s%> and <S%H559>tell<s%> this <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H8085><s%> 'You hear <S%H8085>indeed,<s%> but <S%H995>don't<s%> understand; and you <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H7200>indeed,<s%> but <S%H3045>don't<s%> perceive.'

Make the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of this <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H8080>fat.<s%> Make their <S%H241>ears<s%> <S%H3513>heavy,<s%> and <S%H8173>shut<s%> their <S%H5869>eyes;<s%> lest they <S%H7200>see<s%> with their <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> and <S%H8085>hear<s%> with their <S%H241>ears,<s%> and <S%H995>understand<s%> with their <S%H3824>heart,<s%> and <S%H7725>turn<s%> <S%H7495>again,<s%> and be healed."

Then I <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H136>"Lord,<s%> how <S%H559>long?<s%>" He answered, "Until <S%H5892>cities<s%> are <S%H7582>waste<s%> without <S%H3427>inhabitant,<s%> and <S%H1004>houses<s%> without <S%H120>man,<s%> and the <S%H127>land<s%> becomes <S%H8077>utterly<s%> <S%H7582>waste,<s%>
And <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H7368>removed<s%> <S%H120>men<s%> far <S%H7368>away,<s%> and the <S%H5805>forsaken<s%> places are <S%H7227>many<s%> in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of the <S%H776>land.<s%>

If there is a <S%H6224>tenth<s%> left in <S%H7725>it,<s%> that also will in turn be <S%H1197>consumed:<s%> as a <S%H424>terebinth,<s%> and as an <S%H437>oak,<s%> whose <S%H4678>stock<s%> remains when they are <S%H7995>felled;<s%> so the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H2233>seed<s%> is its <S%H4678>stock.<s%>"
